title: ‘Riverdale’ Snack KJ Apa Plus A Bunch Of Other Celebs Are Coming To Syd Comic-Con This W/E
text:
Listen up, fellow pop culture tragics (i.e. everyone), ‘cos this weekend boasts some of your faves: Oz Comic-Con is heading to Sydney, along with stars from Riverdale, Veronica Mars, Archer and Captain America.

New Zealand actor KJ Apa of Riverdale fame will be on panels both days, along with doing meet and greets, photos and autographs for fans. (Just a quick side note: this guy is from New Zealand?! What are they feeding them over there, hot… muscle… juice? Nope, brain has been fried by good looks, HE LOOKS GOOD.)

Also joining Apa at the convention will be Jason Dohring, who you may remember as everyone’s favourite bad boy heartthrob Logan Echolls from Veronica Mars. He’s back on screens right now opposite Kristin Bell in the show’s reboot (which you can catch on Stan), and he’ll also be doing the panel/photo/autograph circuit.

Hayley Atwell, aka Agent Peggy Carter of the MCU is also gonna be there, along with Aisha Tyler, who voices Lana Kane on Archer (ugh I love her), our very own Keiynan Lonsdale from The Flash, and a bunch of directors, animators and producers of some of the biggest pop culture icons of our era. There’s a panel on Steven Universe y’all!

Check out the whole schedule, along with ticketing info, at ozcomiccon.com.
description: Get pumped, pop culture nerds, 'cos a massive lineup of stars is coming to Sydney, including everyone's favourite Riverdale heartthrob KJ Apa.
